评论概述: Really cute, but needs a good bra underneath
评论详情: The body suit itself is really cute and the fabric is really soft. However, the snaps in the crotch area are difficult to close and even if you opt not to close it, buyer beware. You cannot wear this garment without a bra if you have more than an A-cup size. Certain things threaten to peek out the sides. If this isn't a problem for you, carry on. But if it is, now you know.

This is comfortable, everywhere. The seams are soft, which is a huge bonus. I know some seams are thick and can rub against skin. These are nothing like that. The fabric is stretchy and soft against my skin. It can be paired with jeans, shorts, or a skirt. This can also be fun to use as a part of cosplay.  I highly recommend this.
Got this for an upcoming rave. It's super cute and straight to the point. The fabric is rather thin but that's to be expected. Fit is snug and doesn't scratch
4.5 (Standard rounding rules apply) super soft and comfortable is machine washable would recommened
